title: New chapters
brief_description: Shows the part a public library can play as a workshop, lecture hall and resource centre for the planned cultural activity of the community. Particular emphasis is placed on the provision of facilities for children’s activities in the field of art, music, story telling and play reading. Other activities mentioned include exhibitions, film loans and screenings, play readings and forum discussions on world affairs.
